Articles.Content:
Although I am playing only for 2 months or so, this forum was huge help from the beginning, so I thought I should drop by and say hello at last:) I managed to do some crazy things already, including landings on Duna, Eeelo and Dres, sending probes etc., my biggest goal right now is sth like Jool-5. In the meantime, check out my SSTO It's simple, handles terribly and brakes horribly (I almost crashed)... but I made it to space!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Eh, it got to orbit and didn't crash. I wouldn't complain about that if I were you.

Welcome to the forum.

Welcome! A SSTO is no easy feat, congratulations!

Also, why are you so good at this game after 2 months? Are you Scott Manley in disguise?
Good job! I can't even do half of that!

Despite being a veteran who's built an ISS replica and a reusable Duna program (landers and a station) with remote Tech. STILL! I can never get a space plane into orbit unless you count the shuttle

- - - Updated - - -

PS: You mind posting a link to Dropbox?

https://drive.google.com/open?id=0ByYBSGIZqgvvRkR5SzhhbWlSMVk

- - - Updated - - -

It's nothing fancy, I love building with small part count. I think you all know why:P
